title: Does anyone here closely follow the NA LCS?

replies.body: Man we HAD you :'( Stupid Baron call from us, and honestly, no mikaels or qss? against a Lissandra? I was pissed, made my hangover so much worse this morning

NA is so unpredictable with results, and with such big roster changes in EU its literally anyones game, in any game, at any point, in either LCS. i guess that makes it more fun though, the koreans know how to take the fun out of most of their games, unless its the worse casters eg. not phreak, not jatt, even not-riv
